headline.main: Fighting Words From Moscow; THE WAR OF NATIONAL LIBERATION. By Joseph Stalin. Wartime Addresses of the Soviet Premier, in two volumes, 55 pp. and 40 pp. New York: International Publishing. 75 cents.

lead_paragraph: IF President Roosevelt and Prime Minister Churchill should meet with the head of Soviet Russia, and if that meeting should be held in Washington, then, in all probability, might take place an event which would have been fantastic even three years ago: Joseph Stalin might address a joint session of the Congress of the United States.
abstract: Stalin, J; War of National Liberation
snippet: IF President Roosevelt and Prime Minister Churchill should meet with the head of Soviet Russia, and if that meeting should be held in Washington, then, in all probability, might take place an event which would have been fantastic even three years ...
